title: Nursing Practice Competency Enhancement: Mobile Education Program for Orthognathic Surgery Patient Management

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners will explain pre- and post-orthognathic surgery self-care procedures with at least 80% accuracy.
Learners can identify at least three methods to prevent surgery-related complications using mobile applications.
Learners can demonstrate the practical applicability of learned content through project submissions after training.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
